snippet.title: How To Survive 2 Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Just in time for PAX, How to Survive 2 goes to New Orleans! Come by our booth on the 6th floor to be one of the first to play.

How to Survive 2 comes to Steam Early Access this October.

For behind the scenes details on all of 505's games, head to the official 505 Games Blog: http://www.505games.com/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
